A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cinematically it’s great but story is quite disappointing i don’t know why they must add stupid jokes like the first scene with the “can you hear me now” bit like I get he’s supposed to be stalling or whatever but come on. Star Wars is supposed to be dark and emotional not cute with dumb jokes. it’s like they tried to do “Star Wars guardians of the galaxy” like no Disney get your head out of your ass and make a rugged emotional dark yet beautiful film why do they disrespect Luke like this shouldnt luke be old and wise not a hermit because he has some of first books full of Jedi knowledge. if they don’t fix Star Wars it’s just gonna become transformers all over again just throwing movies out to make money because they know people will watch also it was very disappointing to just find out that Snoke was literally just some randy and dies the first time we actually get to see him it sad to see something end so quick without getting to figure him out. people need to let Disney know that this is not okay \,but in all the negative about the movie there are still some great things about the movie like I love the characters I really do and it looks fantastic but Poe story telling it just felt they went all action with a thin plot I really really hope that Star Wars pulls through with there next movies.
